Sentencas: A model for a 1000 kW class solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system running on biogas from a sewage sludge digestion plant was implemented in a process flow scheme using external steam reforming.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: The model stack consisted of planar anode supported cells operated at 800 degreesC displaying state-of-the-art electrochemical performance (0.15 W/cm(2) at 80% fuel utilisation).
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: Real annual data from an existing sewage plant were used as input to the model.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: From the input of 43 m(3)/h biogas (63% CH4), equivalent to 269 kW (higher heating value, HHV), the SOFC stack was calculated to deliver 131 kW,l electricity (48.7%) using a steam-to-carbon ratio of 0.5.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: This would allow the sewage site to more than cover its own electrical needs, hence to depollute the waste stream at negative energy cost.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: In its current exploitation using a low efficient gas engine (130 M), the site is only approximate to50% self-sufficient.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: Special attention was given to the thermal balance of the stack.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: The stack developed heat (143 kW) could be balanced by endothermal reforming (78 kW) and by cathode excess air lambda (=3), allowing a temperature difference between stack inlet and outlet of 200 K.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: The case was compared to other fuel scenarios.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: Steam-added biogas behaves basically identically to steam-reformed methane.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas

Sentencas: For partial oxidation of biogas or pure hydrogen feeding, electrical efficiency drops to under 43% while needs to be raised to 4.5 to maintain the 200 K thermal gradient over the stack.
Titulo: Process flow model of solid oxide fuel cell system supplied with sewage biogas
